title: Decision: How we vendor/wrap OpenCode server mode
description:
## Options
1) Git submodule in vendor/opencode + minimal wrapper app
2) Fork vendored source in vendor/opencode with patches
3) Bun dependency (no vendored source) + only .opencode extensions

## Decision criteria
- Need to modify OpenCode server routes or only extend via .opencode?
- Ease of upgrades
- Ability to run headless HTTP + SSE reliably

## Acceptance criteria
- [ ] Choose one option and write an ADR in docs/adrs/.
close_reason: ADR 0001 accepted in docs/adrs/2026-02-23-0001-opencode-wrapper-strategy.md
